EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Gary Ham (1329435160.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Gary Ham (1329435160.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Gary, Haha that makes sense. We actually do not have a rate card, our Associates directly negotiate their rates with the government hiring manager. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Gary Ham [mailto:gham@grandpaham.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2012 3:54 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Gary Ham Sara, You missed the tag line - just a bit of a pun involved. It is "Grandpa can do IT!" Please note the capitalization of the final word (geek that I am). :-) As for the Contract vehicle, I may just try it at some point, but I think most of the Gov guys would want the hourly rate and work category pre-established. Do you have examples (names and rate redacted) that would show someone who has done what you suggest below? Respectfully, Gary Ham <http://grandpaham.com">http://grandpaham.com703-899-6241 On Feb 14, 2012, at 6:20 PM, Sara Conde wrote:Hi Gary, My name is Sara Conde and I am helping out Steve. I wanted to introduce myself and address your email below. First and foremost I want to thank you for referencing MBO on your site, we really appreciate that. I also wanted to let you know I love the way you have branded yourself and the tagline “Grandpa Can Do It” is great. We are on the GSA schedule so if you wanted to use MBO with government work you would simply bid on the work, get awarded the BPA, then reference MBO as your contract vichael via our GSA #. I have attached some more information on this. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Take care!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Gary Ham [mailto:gham@grandpaham.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Tuesday, February 14, 2012 9:49 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Gary Ham Steven, I am doing just fine on my own at the moment (actually for the last 5 years). I once considered you as an option. In fact, I still have you as a link at <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://grandpaham.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFlYuGdx%2Bf2XJrnslzTNNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">grandpaham.com as an option for any prime contractors or Gov't type who would be queasy dealing with an independent. I might also be interested at some point in selling through you, if you had an IT contract vehicle of some sort the a Government manager could use with reasonable ease. That I would be willing to talk personally about. I am an IT consultant, Primarily software architecture and design, although I am a pretty good Java programmer as well. It is all on my web site (although I do need to update the resume a bit). I am also an accountant/comptroller by original training (which is why I do not fear such things as taxes or bookkeeping). It is kind of fun to keep my hand in. R/s Gary Hamhttp://grandpaham.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>703-899-6241 On Feb 14, 2012, at 9:30 AM, Steve Arhancet wrote:
Dear Gary, I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFlYuGdx%2Bf2XJrnslzTNNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>. Regards, Steven___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6011f: 703.793.6081e: <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFlYuGdx%2Bf2XJrnslzTNNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">sarhancet@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal><image001.gif> <MBO_GSA_Price_List.pdf>
